bio: Veralene, a Breton woman, is a former resident of Helgen, whose farm estate provided food and horses to the Imperial soldiers living in the city. After the dragon attack, she was left with nothing. Determined to maintain the high-class lifestyle she is accustomed to, Veralene travels between Solitude and Markarth looking for a wealthy person to marry. Veralene has a stuck-up and haughty attitude, and is quite vain.
name: Veralene
